titles.title: A bill to repeal the provision of law that provides automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S392)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary:
1/10/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to eliminate automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress.
